attributes.action: Reduce the burden of Council Tax payments for over 65's as an automatic right
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Old Age pensioners should benefit from reduced council tax payments, as a right and not be subjected to means testing for reductions in payments. A sliding scale is suggested, eg. over 65's getting a 50% reduction, with over 70's attracting a 75% cut in what they should have to pay.
